g.text: Register a new Order in behalf of a customer
asks if the Sales Clerk wants to type the produtsID
asks if the Sales Clerk wants to see the product catalog
asks to type requested data (productID and it's quantity)
asks if the Sales Clerk wants to select products
asks to select the needed data (The wanted produts and it's quantity)
asks if the Sales Clerk wants to create one
asks to select the billing, the delivering address , the shipment method and a method of payment
asks to type the source of the order information
